verses.text: \w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Levi|strong="H3878"\w*: Gershon, \w Kohath|strong="H6955"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*.
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H8034"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Kohath: Amram, Izhar, Hebron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Uzziel.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Amram|strong="H6019"\w*: Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Moses \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Miriam. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron: Nadab \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Abihu, Eleazar \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ithamar.

Eleazar \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Phinehas; Phinehas \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Abishua;

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Abishua \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bukki, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Bukki \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Uzzi,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Uzzi \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zerahiah, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Zerahiah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Meraioth;

Meraioth \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amariah, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Amariah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahitub,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Ahitub \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zadok, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Zadok \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahimaaz,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Ahimaaz \w was|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Azariah, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Azariah \w was|strong="H7586"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Johanan,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Johanan \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Azariah, (\w he|strong="H1121"\w* \w was|strong="H1121"\w* priest \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* house which Solomon put \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem:)

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Azariah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amariah, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Amariah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahitub,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Ahitub \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zadok, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Zadok \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Shallum,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Shallum \w was|strong="H8050"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Hilkiah, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Hilkiah \w was|strong="H8050"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Azariah,

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Azariah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Seraiah, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Seraiah \w was|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* father \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jehozadak;

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Jehozadak went \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H1121"\w* prisoner \w when|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Lord took away Judah \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem \w by|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* hand \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Nebuchadnezzar.
\w The|strong="H0834"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Levi; Gershom, Kohath, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Merari.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* these \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* names \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Gershom: Libni \w and|strong="H3068"\w* Shimei.
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5975"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Kohath \w were|strong="H1121"\w* Amram, Izhar, Hebron, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Uzziel.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Merari: Mahli \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Mushi. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* these \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w families|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Levites listed \w by|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* names \w of|strong="H1121"\w* their fathers.

\w Of|strong="H1121"\w* Gershom: Libni \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Jahath \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Zimmah \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

Joah \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Iddo \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Zerah \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Jeatherai \w his|strong="H0511"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Kohath: Amminadab \w his|strong="H8480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Korah|strong="H7141"\w* \w his|strong="H8480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w Assir|strong="H0617"\w* \w his|strong="H8480"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

Elkanah \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ebiasaph \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Assir \w his|strong="H3478"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

Tahath \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Uriel \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Uzziah \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Shaul \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.
\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elkanah: Amasai \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Ahimoth.
Elkanah \w his|strong="H2226"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*: Zophai \w his|strong="H2226"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Nahath \w his|strong="H2226"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,

Eliab \w his|strong="H8096"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Jeroham \w his|strong="H8096"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Elkanah \w his|strong="H8096"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Samuel \w his|strong="H8096"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Samuel: \w the|strong="H1121"\w* oldest Joel, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* second Abiah.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Merari|strong="H4847"\w*: Mahli, Libni \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Shimei \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Uzzah \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Shimea \w his|strong="H0558"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Haggiah \w his|strong="H0558"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Asaiah \w his|strong="H0558"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* these \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w those|strong="H1121"\w* whom David made responsible \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* music \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Lord, after \w the|strong="H1121"\w* ark \w had|strong="H1121"\w* rest.

They gave worship with songs before \w the|strong="H1121"\w* House \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* meeting, till Solomon put \w up|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Lord \w in|strong="H1121"\w* Jerusalem; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* they took \w their|strong="H4847"\w* places \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H4847"\w* work \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H4847"\w* regular order.

\w And|strong="H0430"\w* \w these|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* did \w this|strong="H3605"\w* \w work|strong="H5656"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* sons. \w Of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sons \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Kohathites: Heman, \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* melody, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Joel, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Samuel,

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elkanah, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jeroham, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Eliel, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Toah,

\w The|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zuph, \w the|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elkanah, \w the|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Mahath, \w the|strong="H0499"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amasai,

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Elkanah, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Joel, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Azariah, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zephaniah,

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Tahath, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Assir, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ebiasaph, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Korah,

\w The|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Izhar, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Kohath, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi, \w the|strong="H6659"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Israel.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* brother Asaph, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w right|strong="H0175"\w* hand, Asaph, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Berechiah, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Shimea,
\w The|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Michael, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Baaseiah, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Malchijah,

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ethni, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zerah, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Adaiah,

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ethan, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Zimmah, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Shimei,
\w The|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Jahath, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Gershom, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Levi.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* on \w the|strong="H0853"\w* left their brothers, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Merari: Ethan, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Kishi, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Abdi, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* son \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Malluch,
\w The|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Hashabiah, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Amaziah, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* son \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Hilkiah,

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Amzi, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Bani, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Shemer,

\w The|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Mahli, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Mushi, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Merari, \w the|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Levi.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H8147"\w* brothers \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Levites \w were|strong="H1121"\w* responsible \w for|strong="H1121"\w* all \w the|strong="H1121"\w* work \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1121"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* God.

\w But|strong="H3881"\w* Aaron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H5414"\w* \w offerings|strong="H3478"\w* \w on|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w of|strong="H1121"\w* burned offering, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w on|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* altar \w of|strong="H1121"\w* perfume, \w for|strong="H5414"\w* all \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w work|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* most holy \w place|strong="H5414"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w take|strong="H5414"\w* away \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sin \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, doing everything ordered \w by|strong="H3478"\w* \w Moses|strong="H5414"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* servant \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w God|strong="H5414"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Aaron: Eleazar \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Phinehas \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Abishua \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Bukki \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Uzzi \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, Zerahiah \w his|strong="H1961"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*,
Meraioth \w his|strong="H5414"\w* son, Amariah \w his|strong="H5414"\w* son, Ahitub \w his|strong="H5414"\w* son,
Zadok his son, Ahimaaz his son.

Now these are their living-places, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* limits inside which they were \w to|strong="H0853"\w* put \w up|strong="H0853"\w* their tents: \w to|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Aaron, \w of|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* families \w of|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Kohathites, because they \w had|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* first selection,

\w To|strong="H1121"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* they gave Hebron \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* outskirts \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w land|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Judah;

But \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w open|strong="H4054"\w* country \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* town, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* small places round \w it|strong="H1121"\w*, they gave \w to|strong="H1121"\w* Caleb, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jephunneh.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w to|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Aaron they gave Hebron, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* town \w to|strong="H4294"\w* which men might go \w in|strong="H6943"\w* flight \w and|strong="H4054"\w* be safe, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Libnah \w with|strong="H4294"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* outskirts, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Jattir, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Eshtemoa \w with|strong="H4294"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* outskirts,
\w And|strong="H4054"\w* Hilen \w with|strong="H0853"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* outskirts, Debir \w with|strong="H0853"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* outskirts,
\w And|strong="H4054"\w* Ashan \w with|strong="H4294"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* outskirts, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Beth-shemesh \w with|strong="H4294"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* outskirts;

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w from|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tribe \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Benjamin: Geba \w with|strong="H0853"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* outskirts, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Alemeth \w with|strong="H0853"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* outskirts, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* Anathoth \w with|strong="H0853"\w* \w its|strong="H0853"\w* outskirts. All their towns among their families were thirteen towns.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w to|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* rest \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Kohath there were given by \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord's decision ten towns \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* families \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Ephraim \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Dan \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* half-tribe \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Manasseh.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Gershom, \w by|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H4847"\w* \w families|strong="H1121"\w*, \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Issachar, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Asher, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Naphtali, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Manasseh \w in|strong="H1121"\w* Bashan, thirteen towns.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w to|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Merari, by their families, twelve towns \w were|strong="H3383"\w* given by \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord's decision, \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w Reuben|strong="H7205"\w*, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Gad, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Zebulun.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Israel gave \w to|strong="H6932"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Levites \w the|strong="H0853"\w* towns \w with|strong="H0853"\w* their outskirts.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* they gave by \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord's decision \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Judah, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Simeon, \w and|strong="H4054"\w* \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w tribe|strong="H4294"\w* \w of|strong="H4294"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* children \w of|strong="H4294"\w* Benjamin, these towns whose names \w are|strong="H4294"\w* given.

\w And|strong="H4054"\w* \w to|strong="H0853"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* families \w of|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* sons \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Kohath were given towns by \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord's decision \w out|strong="H0853"\w* \w of|strong="H4054"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* tribe \w of|strong="H4054"\w* Ephraim.
And they gave them the town to which men might go in flight and be safe, Shechem in the hill-country of Ephraim with its outskirts, and Gezer with its outskirts,
And Jokmeam with its outskirts, and Beth-horon with its outskirts,
And Aijalon with its outskirts, and Gath-rimmon with its outskirts;
And out of the half-tribe of Manasseh, Aner with its outskirts, and Bileam with its outskirts, for the rest of the family of the sons of Kohath.
To the sons of Gershom were given, out of the family of the half-tribe of Manasseh, Golan in Bashan with its outskirts, and Ashtaroth with its outskirts;
And out of the tribe of Issachar, Kedesh with its outskirts, and Daberath with its outskirts,
And Ramoth with its outskirts, and Anem with its outskirts;
And out of the tribe of Asher, Mashal with its outskirts, and Abdon with its outskirts,
And Hukok with its outskirts, and Rehob with its outskirts;
And out of the tribe of Naphtali, Kedesh in Galilee with its outskirts, and Hammon with its outskirts, and Kiriathaim with its outskirts.
To the rest of the Levites, the sons of Merari, were given, out of the tribe of Zebulun, Rimmono with its outskirts, Tabor with its outskirts;
And on the other side of Jordan, at Jericho, on the east side of Jordan, were given them, out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the waste land with its outskirts, and Jahzah with its outskirts,
And Kedemoth with its outskirts, and Mephaath with its outskirts;
And out of the tribe of Gad, Ramoth in Gilead with its outskirts, and Mahanaim with its outskirts,
And Heshbon with its outskirts, and Jazer with its outskirts.
